title: Signature witnessing (contracts, agreements, wills)
dataVerified: Signer name, witness name, notary name, notary commission number, document type, witnessing date, notary seal
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents forged witness certifications on critical legal documents. Domain binding verifies notary commission. Will execution verification requires authenticated witness signatures. Contract authenticity for business agreements. Estate disputes often hinge on valid witness certifications. Prevents forgery fraud in high-value transactions. Critical for legal documents where witness attestation proves proper execution.
